thread.section_title: Hotel Arvor Saint Georges - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: would definetely return
thread.title_full: would definetely return - Review of Hotel Arvor Saint Georges, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: simine2017
title: would definetely return
text: Very nice hotel, with clean rooms and comfortable bed.The staff was excellent and always eager to help, fairly good price and an overall great location. A minus for breakfast- it is expensive and not satisfying and during winter the room is a bit chilly (old fashioned heating system), but these were truly minor problems.
